content.p: Be part of a faculty that has a passion for healthcare and the science that underpins it. Using the latest research to help inform your teaching and learning We have a wide range of exciting and inspiring undergraduate, postgraduate and research courses. Studying in one of our four schools you'll learn from experts in their field and have access to facilities that let you get hands-on. With teaching that's informed by the latest research, you'll always be learning the latest developments in healthcare and medical science. If you'd like to find out more about our courses you can make an enquiry, or book an open day to experience what studying at Nottingham is like.
